Class MotionEstimatorAlgorithm.TEMPLATE_MATCH

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.processing.motion.MotionEstimatorAlgorithm

  • Enclosing class:
    MotionEstimatorAlgorithm

    public static class MotionEstimatorAlgorithm.TEMPLATE_MATCH
extends MotionEstimatorAlgorithm
    Within a search window around the subimages detect most likely match and thus motion.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TEMPLATE_MATCH()
